item.title: How to Have a Closer Walk with God 2
item.description: This is the concluding part of how to walk in a closer relationship with the Lord. God is more than a friend and life to us. He is closer to us than our breath. So, in our pilgrimage on this earth, we need to stay closer to Him than even our loved ones.
